member.name: IInternalUnknown.QueryInternalInterface
member.summary: Retrieves pointers to the supported internal interfaces on an object.
member.param: The identifier of the internal interface being requested.

The address of a pointer variable that receives the interface pointer requested in the riid parameter. Upon successful return, *ppv contains the requested interface pointer to the object. If the object does not support the interface, *ppv is set to NULL.
member.returns: This method returns S_OK if the interface is supported, and E_NOINTERFACE otherwise.

member.name: IInternalUnknown
member.summary: Used exclusively in lightweight client-side handlers that require access to some of the internal interfaces on the proxy.
